verses.verse: Having <S%G2192><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> promises, <S%G1860><s%> dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> let us cleanse <S%G2511><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> from all <S%G3956><s%> filthiness <S%G3436><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> and spirit, <S%G4151><s%> perfecting <S%G2005><s%> holiness <S%G42><s%> in the fear <S%G5401><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Receive <S%G5562><s%> us; we have wronged <S%G91><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> we have corrupted <S%G5351><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> we have defrauded <S%G4122><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man. <S%G3762><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> not this to condemn <S%G2633><s%> you: for I have said <S%G4280><s%> before, <S%G4280><s%> that you are in our hearts <S%G2588><s%> to die <S%G4880><s%> and live <S%G4800><s%> with you.

Great <S%G4183><s%> is my boldness <S%G3954><s%> of speech toward <S%G4314><s%> you, great <S%G4183><s%> is my glorying <S%G2746><s%> of you: I am filled <S%G4137><s%> with comfort, <S%G3874><s%> I am exceeding <S%G5248><s%> joyful <S%G5479><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> our tribulation. <S%G2347><s%>

For, when we were come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> our flesh <S%G4561><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> rest, <S%G425><s%> but we were troubled <S%G2346><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> side; without <S%G1855><s%> were fights, <S%G3163><s%> within <S%G2081><s%> were fears. <S%G5401><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that comforts <S%G3870><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> that are cast <S%G5011><s%> down, <S%G5011><s%> comforted <S%G3870><s%> us by the coming <S%G3952><s%> of Titus; <S%G5103><s%>

And not by his coming <S%G3952><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but by the consolation <S%G3874><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> he was comforted <S%G3870><s%> in you, when he told <S%G312><s%> us your <S%G5216><s%> earnest <S%G1972><s%> desire, <S%G1972><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mourning, <S%G3602><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fervent <S%G2205><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> toward <S%G5228><s%> me; so <S%G5620><s%> that I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> the more. <S%G3123><s%>

For though <S%G1499><s%> I made <S%G3076><s%> you sorry <S%G3076><s%> with a letter, <S%G1992><s%> I do not repent, <S%G3338><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> I did repent: <S%G3338><s%> for I perceive <S%G991><s%> that the same <S%G1565><s%> letter <S%G1992><s%> has made <S%G3076><s%> you sorry, <S%G3076><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> it were but for a season. <S%G5610><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> I rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> not that you were made <S%G3076><s%> sorry, <S%G3076><s%> but that you sorrowed <S%G3076><s%> to repentance: <S%G3341><s%> for you were made <S%G3076><s%> sorry <S%G3076><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> a godly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2316><s%> manner, that you might receive <S%G2210><s%> damage <S%G2210><s%> by us in nothing. <S%G3367><s%>

For godly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2316><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> works <S%G2716><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%> to salvation <S%G4991><s%> not to be repented <S%G278><s%> of: but the sorrow <S%G3077><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> works <S%G2716><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

For behold <S%G2400><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> selfsame <S%G846><s%> thing, that you sorrowed <S%G3076><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> a godly <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2316><s%> sort, what <S%G4214><s%> carefulness <S%G4710><s%> it worked <S%G2716><s%> in you, yes, <S%G235><s%> what clearing <S%G627><s%> of yourselves, yes, <S%G235><s%> what indignation, <S%G24><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> what fear, <S%G5401><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> what vehement <S%G1972><s%> desire, <S%G1972><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> what zeal, <S%G2205><s%> yes, <S%G235><s%> what revenge! <S%G1557><s%> In all <S%G3956><s%> things you have approved <S%G4921><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> to be clear <S%G53><s%> in this <S%G3588><s%> matter. <S%G4229><s%>

Why, <S%G686><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> to you, I did it not for his cause <S%G1752><s%> that had done <S%G91><s%> the wrong, <S%G91><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> for his cause <S%G1752><s%> that suffered wrong, <S%G91><s%> but that our care <S%G4710><s%> for you in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might appear <S%G5319><s%> to you.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> we were comforted <S%G3870><s%> in your <S%G5213><s%> comfort: <S%G3874><s%> yes, and exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> joyed <S%G5463><s%> we for the joy <S%G5479><s%> of Titus, <S%G5103><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> his spirit <S%G4151><s%> was refreshed <S%G373><s%> by you all. <S%G3956><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> I have boasted <S%G2744><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> thing to him of you, I am not ashamed; <S%G2617><s%> but as we spoke <S%G2980><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to you in truth, <S%G225><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> our boasting, <S%G2746><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> I made before <S%G1909><s%> Titus, <S%G5103><s%> is found <S%G1096><s%> a truth. <S%G225><s%>

And his inward <S%G4698><s%> affection <S%G4698><s%> is more <S%G4056><s%> abundant <S%G4056><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you, whilst he remembers <S%G363><s%> the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of you all, <S%G3956><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> with fear <S%G5401><s%> and trembling <S%G5156><s%> you received <S%G1209><s%> him.
I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> therefore that I have confidence <S%G2292><s%> in you in all <S%G3956><s%> things.
